akn:content.akn:p: The organic rules may provide for allocating profits of a limited cooperative association among members, among persons that are not members but conduct business with the association, to an unallocated account, or to any combination thereof. Unless the organic rules otherwise provide, losses of the association shall be allocated in the same proportion as profits.
Unless the organic rules otherwise provide, all profits and losses of a limited cooperative association shall be allocated to patron members.
